text: İhsan Ketin Natural History Museum () is a museum within the Mining Engineering Faculty of İstanbul Technical University. The free-of-charge museum was established in the Faculty building at . The museum was named after Turkish geologist İhsan Ketin (1914-1995)Estanbul who'swho page The exhibited collections are Museum page *Darwin 2000 Beagle series *İstanbul invertebrate fossils *Zonguldak fossil flora *Solnhofen fossil fauna * Aegean Region plants and fishes ==References== ==External links== *Exhibited items Category:Istanbul Technical University Category:Museums in Istanbul Category:Natural history museums in Turkey
title: Natural History Museum of İhsan Ketin
